text: hpir'avnum, avanutaiya piramukarkalum tankalait tunpuruttuvarkale enra payattin karanamaka, musavin mitu avarutaiya camukattarin cantatiyinar cilarait tavira (veru) iman kollavillai, enenil, niccayamaka hpir'avn anta pumiyil valimai mikkavanaka iruntan; varampu mirik (kotumai ceypavanakavum) iruntan
